titleStmt.title: Lilly lash't vvith his ovvn rod. Or, An epigram on the quaint skill of that arch temporizing astrologer Mr. William Lilly. Collected out of his almanacks, from [1]647, to this present year, 1660.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Sound first A trumpet, that the world may hear ..."
There are two states: a) imprint has "." after "year"; b) has "," after "year".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
